subject: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body:
Oshin Shahiean, Partner
OTS SOLICITORS
60 CANNON STREET
LONDON EC4N 6NP
ENGLAND
Email: 
info@otschamber-uk.com
 
attorneyoshinshahiean@gmail.com
Attention: Mr. xxx
Sir,
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email.
Yes we have been put on notice by Mr. Chris Jones that you will require our services to secure the release of your outstanding payment which has been long overdue.
You are by this email requested to fill the attached forms and return the same to us accordingly.
When you return the form we shall vet it at the notary office to ascertain the exact amount to be paid in form of stamp duty and court charges accordingly.
Please note that once these forms are processed and legalized by the court here in London, we shall then proceed to the bank to effect the wire transfer of your payment as approved in the questionnaire that you completed.
I will be expecting your immediate response.
Sincerely,  
For: OTS SOLICITORS  
Attorney  Oshin Shahiean

subject: Re: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body:
Dear Attorney Oshin Shahiean,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your willingness to assist me in securing the release of my payment. Before I proceed with filling out the attached forms, could you please provide me with some more information about the process?

1. What exactly is the purpose of these forms? How will they help in releasing my payment?
2. Could you explain what stamp duty and court charges are? Why do I need to pay them?
3. How long does it usually take for the forms to be processed and legalized by the court?
4. Once the forms are processed, how soon can I expect my payment to be transferred?

I apologize for my lack of knowledge in legal matters, but I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Craig

subject: Re: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body:
Dear Mr. Craig,

I have forwarded the email to the attorney Oshin so he can answer the
questions you raised and send it to you directly.

Once you hear from the attorney do keep me informed.

Kind regards,

Chris Jones.

subject: Re: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body:
Dear Mr. Craig,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email and the information you have shared. It seems like you have some concerns that require the expertise of an attorney.

I'm glad to hear that you have forwarded my email to Attorney Oshin. I look forward to hearing from him and getting answers to the questions I raised. Please do keep me informed about any updates or responses from him.

In the meantime, is there anything else you would like to share or discuss? I'm open to hearing more about your experiences or any other information you think might be relevant.

Thank you again for reaching out, and I hope we can continue this conversation.

Best wishes,
Craig

subject: Re: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body:
Dear Craig,

Thanks for the update.

The procedure for the release of your fund now is with the attorney and
yourself.

Do follow his instructions and keep me.updated.

Once you are through with him.he will send the validated copies of the form
to the bank for the release of your fund to you.

I will be waiting to hear from you.

Kind regards,

Chris Jones.

subject: Re: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body:
Dear Chris Jones,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the update regarding the release of my fund. Could you please provide me with more details about the attorney and their role in this process? I want to make sure that everything is being handled correctly.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "validated copies of the form"? What form are you referring to, and why is it necessary for the release of my funds?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Craig

subject: Re: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body:
Dear Craig,

I have already given you the contact information of the attorney.  His role
is to validate your payment legally so that the bank will release your fund
to you.

The attorney will issue you forms to fill. When you fill those forms he
will take it to the court to legalise them. That is what validation means
and after that he will take it to the bank for the release of your fund.

Kind regards,

Chris Jones.

subject: Re: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body:
Hello  Craig,

Have you reached out with attorney Oshin?

Chris,

subject: Re: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body:
Hi Chris,

No, I haven't reached out to attorney Oshin yet. What can you tell me about him? Is he a reputable attorney? I'm always interested in learning about legal professionals who can help with various matters.

Best wishes,
Craig

subject: Re: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body:
Dear Chris Jones,

Thank you for providing me with this information. I appreciate your help in guiding me through the process. Could you please tell me more about the attorney? What is their name and contact information? I want to make sure I have all the necessary details before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Craig

subject: Re: Oshin Shahiean, Partner
body: U WILL LEARN LEGAL PROFESSIONALS WELL OK.
